About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Adult learner and non-traditional student. Currently working as a Senior Software Engineer @GEICO, while working through masters coursework for a MS in Management & Leadership @WGU.

COURSEWORK: Java Programming | Database Design & SQL | HTML, CSS & JavaScript | C Programming | Data Analysis with R | Data Structures & Algorithms | Data Wrangling | Data Visualization

EXTRACURRICULARS: Phi Theta Kappa | Honors Club | Gamer’s Club | Society of Hispanic Professional Engineers

Senior Software Engineer

  • Develop APIs for consumption across application services for tag manager migration (Node, Bruno).
  • Mentored junior developers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement within the team (Code Reviews, Pair Programming).
